settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
At Awareness Avenue, we take pride in creating jewelry that’s not just stunning but also completely skin-safe. Every piece is handcrafted with care, using premium materials like 925 sterling silver, durable stainless steel, and solid gold—depending on the design. Many of our pieces are plated with platinum, giving them a brilliant finish while ensuring they’re hypoallergenic and perfect for even the most sensitive skin.

And here’s the best part—our jewelry is designed to stay as beautiful as the day you got it. You’ll never have to worry about ugly green or black marks tarnishing your skin or your style. Our moissanite stones, ethically sourced and expertly cut, add dazzling brilliance and clarity that rivals diamonds. Whether it’s a ring, necklace, bracelet, or earrings, our pieces are made to be timeless, durable, and completely worry-free, so you can shine confidently every day.

settings.title: Size & Fit
settings.content:
At Awareness Avenue, we believe jewelry should fit as perfectly as it feels. All of our pieces that require sizing—whether rings, bracelets, or other styles—are made true to standard U.S. sizes, and we pride ourselves on being size-inclusive.

We offer a broader range of sizes than most jewelers because beauty and love come in every size, and so should your jewelry.

Not sure about your size? Take your best guess! If it’s not quite right, don’t sweat it—we’ve got your back. We’ll happily resize your piece or replace it with the correct size, and we’ll cover the cost.

With our easy returns and exchanges, you can shop confidently knowing that the perfect fit is always guaranteed.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.content:
We stand behind the quality and craftsmanship of our jewelry with our lifetime warranty.

What does that mean? That means if for any reason your jewelry does not meet quality expectations as a result of manufacturing defects; we will replace it for free - we won't even ask you to return the defective piece.

Our promise of "Ethical Jewelry, Guaranteed for Life" means every piece is crafted to be a lasting symbol of beauty and integrity.

We want you to feel confident that your jewelry will remain as stunning as the day you first wore it, now and for years to come.

settings.title: Conflict Free
settings.content:
At Awareness Avenue, we’re committed to offering high-quality, conflict-free jewelry you can feel good about wearing. Every piece is individually handmade and features moissanite gemstones—an ethical and stunning alternative to mined diamonds. Our stones are expertly cut for exceptional color, clarity, and brilliance, so you can shine with confidence.

We use only the purest, high-quality materials to ensure your jewelry is skin-safe, durable, and free from unpleasant surprises like fading, green marks, or black marks. Plus, all of our moissanite gemstones are ethically sourced, reflecting our dedication to sustainable and responsible production.

To back it up, we include GRA certification with every eligible piece, so you know exactly what you’re getting. And with our lifetime warranty, you can trust that your jewelry will continue to dazzle for years to come.

settings.title: Questions?
settings.content:
support@awareness-avenue.com

Got a custom request?

We are able to accomodate mostly anything you dream of when it comes to your jewelry. Let us know what you need at support@awareness-avenue.com and we'll get back you!
